What is Yoga?

Yoga is an ancestral practice, which combine different body postures named asanas and breathing technics named pranayama
Read more about yoga

Who should practice yoga?

Yoga is for everyone!
There are different variations available for any age, body types or injuries

Types of yoga

  • Hatha Yoga
  • Yin Yoga
  • Restaurative Yoga
  • Ashtanga Yoga
  • Flow yoga

3 Things you should know from Yoga

  1. You don't need to be flexible, but you can be more flexible as you practice
  2. It is not necessary a calm or a quiet practice, there are differents styles that would make you sweat, a lot!
  3. It is not a religious practice, but you can get atractted to undestand a litle bit more about its hindu origins

Benefits

Anxiety Flexibility Strength
Decrease Anxiety and Stress Increase flexibility Increase strength
